entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: The vandalism at the crate manufacturing company was a dead end, though you did help to disable some bombs.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are investigating vandalism at a crate manufacturing company.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Investigate a report of vandalism at the Joben Crate Company. Speak with the owner, Talan Joben.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Near the vandalized machinery, you find a datapad with a message saying that bombs have been placed near a hotel in major cities throughout the galaxy. The bombs are in crates manufactured by this company, and more violence is threatened unless the manufacturing of crates throughout the galaxy is stopped.
entries.task02_message_box_text: On the screen of the datapad is a message: "Bombs have been placed near hotels in major cities throughout the galaxy. These bombs are in crates manufactured by this very company! There will be more unless the manufacturing of crates throughout the galaxy is stopped. Heed well this warning!"
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Find the bombs! You know that they will be found near hotels, but you do not know which cities. Hurry!
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Next to that last bomb, you found a tarnished badge saying that Riyan Kiner has explored the depths of the Agrilat Crystal Swamp.
entries.task04_message_box_text: Next to that last bomb, you found a tarnished badge saying, "Riyan Kiner has explored the depths of the Agrilat Crystal Swamp."
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Confront Riyan Kiner and find out what he knows about the bombs.
